nodes.text: The Future Glory Committee was a Galactic Republic initiative begun by General Var Suthra of the Republic Military by the time of the Cold War of 3653–3641 BBY between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Senator Leontyne Saresh of the Ojoster sector was a primary supporter of the initiative.

The Future Glory Committee was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia in the entry for Senator Leontyne Saresh, but the entry does not specify anything about the initiative beyond its name and relation to General Suthra.
